dct_title_s: Oil & gas map of the Middle East & Africa / produced by the Petroleum Economist Ltd., London, in association with BNP Paribas ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush
dct_description_sm: Relief and depths shown by shading. Shows oil fields, oil pipelines, oil pipelines planned or under construction, oil refineries, gas fields, gas pipelines, gas pipelines planned or under construction, major gas processing plants, underground gas storage facilities, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, liquefied natural gas planned export plants, liquefied natural gas plants under construction, LPG storage, and tanker terminals. "Published February 2011." Includes statistical tables, and graphs illustrating: world and regional oil and gas production and reserves, regional refinery capacity, regional trade 2009. Title panel and advertisement on verso.
dct_subject_sm: Liquefied natural gas shipping terminals—Middle East—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Liquefied natural gas shipping terminals—Middle East—Maps
